data.name: machinehint
data.value: Perhaps Fidget can help here.

data.name: villager
data.value: Press [UP] to speak with a friendly character.

data.name: multipledest
data.value: You now have multiple destinations. Consult your map by clicking [RTHUMB].

data.name: trialdestroywall
data.value: Some walls can be destroyed. Keep your eyes open for hidden treasure!

data.name: recharge
data.value: Your Energy has been depleted! Keep an eye on the flaming white bar in the HUD. Perform melee combos to regain energy.

data.name: carrybomb
data.value: You've discovered a Bomb Fruit! Use the DUST STORM ([Y]) to pluck and guide the fruit.

data.name: trialupgrade2
data.value: Press [B] to cast a Projectile, then immediately hold [Y] to perform the DUST STORM. You can also DUST STORM while in the air for increased maneuverability!

data.name: trialupgrade1
data.value: Well done! Collect the Upgrade Orb to increase your abilities!

data.name: dialogueskip
data.value: [B] Pause/Skip

data.name: pcmultipledest
data.value: You now have multiple destinations. Consult your map by pressing [MAP].

data.name: blueprint
data.value: You've acquired a blueprint! The blacksmith at the top of Archers' Pass can craft this item for you. Check the Inventory to see what materials are needed.

data.name: pcdamage
data.value: You've taken damage! Your health is indicated by the green bar in the HUD. Evade with [LT] and [RT].

data.name: combat3
data.value: The Fallen (Downward Strike in Air) [DOWN] + [Y]

data.name: combat2
data.value: Rising Phoenix (Ground to Air) [X],[Y]

data.name: combat1
data.value: Ash Bound (Ground Throw) [X],[X],[Y],[Y]

data.name: combat0
data.value: From Whence It Came [X],[X],[X],[X]

data.name: combat4
data.value: The Undoing (Air Throw) [X],[X],[X],[Y]

data.name: needbomb
data.value: This wall is reinforced with a powerful alloy. Something explosive should do the trick.

data.name: shopstock
data.value: Merchants will occasionally restock materials in their catalogue. Ensuring a healthy catalogue can work to your advantage.

data.name: walljump
data.value: While hanging, you can aim your next jump with [LTHUMB] before tapping [A].

data.name: pctreasure
data.value: Fidget will alert you when treasure is nearby. Press [MAP] to access the map.

data.name: blomb
data.value: Blombs are vulnerable while taking a deep breath.

data.name: parry
data.value: Hold [X] to parry an incoming enemy attack with one of your own. Immediately follow-up with [X] or [Y] for a powerful counter!

data.name: quest
data.value: A Quest has been updated. Navigate to the Quest screen in the Inventory for details.

data.name: exp
data.value: Your experience is indicated by the blue bar in the HUD. Level-Up by killing enemies and earning HIT CHAIN bonuses.

data.name: slide
data.value: You can slide through here. Hold [DOWN] and press [A].

data.name: challenge
data.value: Welcome to the Challenge Arena! Defeat enemies and destroy lamps for points. You will lose points by taking damage. Complete the challenge quickly for a score bonus! Good luck!

data.name: healthItem
data.value: A Healing Item has been placed into your QUICK ITEM SLOT. Press [LB] to heal, or [BACK] to manage your Inventory.

data.name: dialogueprogress
data.value: [A] Continue

data.name: treasure
data.value: Fidget will alert you when treasure is nearby. Click [RTHUMB] to access the map.

data.name: dropstairs
data.value: You can drop down through descending staircases. Hold [DOWN] to crouch, then press [A].

data.name: unlocking
data.value: Input the button sequence before time runs out to open this lock.

data.name: damage
data.value: You've taken damage! Your health is indicated by the green bar in the HUD. Evade with [LT] and [RT] or [RTHUMB].

data.name: defend
data.value: Press [X] to wage war.

data.name: pcwalljump
data.value: While hanging, you can aim your next jump with [UP], [LEFT], [DOWN], and [RIGHT] before tapping [A].

data.name: pcunlocking
data.value: Input the direction sequence with [LTHUMB] before time runs out to open this lock.

data.name: attack
data.value: Press [X] to begin a melee combo. Advance the combo with [X] and [Y].

data.name: rescued
data.value: You've found a friend, earning a permanent 5% health bonus! You can visit your friends in the Sanctuary, accessible via the World Map.

data.name: upgrade01
data.value: Fidget has acquired a new Projectile type! Press [RB] to cycle through Fidget's available Projectile types.

data.name: upgrade00
data.value: DUST STORM Acquired! Press [B] to throw a Projectile, then immediately hold [Y] to perform the DUST STORM.

data.name: upgrade14
data.value: Crouch Slide Acquired! Hold [DOWN] and press [A].

data.name: upgrade15
data.value: Double Jump Acquired! Press [A] while in the air to perform a second jump.

data.name: upgrade16
data.value: Iron Grip Acquired! Jump and press toward a vine with [LTHUMB] to begin climbing a wall.

data.name: upgrade17
data.value: Boost Jump Acquired! Press [A] while riding an air current for a massive boost upwards.

data.name: upgrade10
data.value: Dash Acquired! Dash with [LT] and [RT] or [RTHUMB]. Dashing uses Energy, indicated by the flaming white bar in your HUD.

data.name: upgrade12
data.value: Aerial DUST STORM Acquired! Hold [Y] mid-jump to fly through the air and target enemies from afar!

data.name: pccarrybomb
data.value: You've discovered a Bomb Fruit! Use the DUST STORM with [Y] to pluck and guide the fruit.

data.name: saveheal
data.value: Depending on your Difficulty Level, Save Monuments will also restore some of your health.

data.name: challengescoreboard
data.value: Press [UP] in front of the Tablet to view high scores.

data.name: menuHelp5
data.value:
Welcome to the Stats screen.
On this page you can view various gameplay statistics.

data.name: menuHelp4
data.value:
Welcome to the Materials screen.
Materials are collected from enemies, and can be crafted into better equipment by a blacksmith.
Materials can also be sold to shops. Once catalogued, shops will attempt to restock their inventory. Use this to your advantage when materials are scarce.

data.name: menuHelp3
data.value:
Welcome to your Quest Log.
From here, you can view active and completed quests, as well as any notes you've picked up.

data.name: menuHelp2
data.value:
Welcome to your Map.
From here, you can view explored areas within the current region. You can also get a sense of any treasure within the immediate vicinity.

data.name: menuHelp1
data.value:
Welcome to your Inventory.
From this screen, you can manage Equipment and Items. If your health is low (indicated by the green bar in your HUD), you can assign a healing item to the QUICK ITEM SLOT and quickly use it in-game with [LB].
Note the context sensitive controls at the bottom of each screen for additional options.

data.name: menuHelp0
data.value:
Welcome to the Character screen.
From here, you can assign Skill Gems acquired by leveling-up to improve your attributes. Note that your highest stat must be within 4 gems of your lowest stat.

data.name: triallocked
data.value: Paths such as the one above will become available as you upgrade your abilities.

data.name: trialmove
data.value: Welcome to the Trial of Dust: An Elysian Tail! Use [LTHUMB] or [DPAD] to move.

data.name: trialjump
data.value: Dash with [LT] and [RT] or [RTHUMB]. Dashing uses Energy, indicated by the flaming white bar in your HUD.

data.name: questgiver
data.value: Characters with an [ICON_360] over their head are Quest Givers. Speak to them to open up Quests and new regions throughout the world.

data.name: pcmove
data.value: Use [LEFT] and [RIGHT] to move.

data.name: pcupgrade16
data.value: Iron Grip Acquired! Jump and press toward a vine with [LEFT] or [RIGHT] to begin climbing a wall.

data.name: pcupgrade10
data.value: Dash Acquired! Dash with [LT] and [RT]. Dashing uses Energy, indicated by the flaming white bar in your HUD.

data.name: drop
data.value: You can drop down through here. Hold [DOWN] to crouch, then press [A].

data.name: gate
data.value: Resonance Gates will only open if you have a Resonance Gem of the same color.

data.name: look
data.value: Hold [UP] or [DOWN] to look up or down.

data.name: move
data.value: Use [LTHUMB] or [DPAD] to move.

data.name: jump
data.value: Press [A] to jump.

data.name: save
data.value: Run through a Save Monument to auto-save your progress. Press [UP] to manually save to a slot.

data.name: shop
data.value: Press [UP] to enter a shop.
